name: @dcs-delta/msdk-declarations
description: Delta type declarations for the DCS Mission Scripting Environment.

scripts.generate-index: cd src && find types -type f -name '*.d.ts' -exec echo '/// <reference path="{}" />' \; > index.d.ts
scripts.package-prep: mkdir -vp bin && rm -rf obj && cp -a src obj && cp package.json obj/
scripts.package: ( test -f src/index.d.ts || npm run generate-index) && npm run package-prep && cd obj && npm pack --pack-destination ../bin
